parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number of the current page when performing a paginated query.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items per page in a paginated query. The default value is **20**.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description:
Rule ID.
> You can call the [LisCheckRule](~~2590599~~) interface to get this parameter.
